availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Rush (Meade County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Buckner Rush in Meade County, Kentucky, in December 1825. Father of Clarinda Rush, John Rush, Addison Rush, Cyrus Rush, Edwin Rush, Enos B. Rush, Mary E. Rush, and Benjamin F. Rush. Farmer in Meade County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 186B-187A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 723.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film #000390310.
